blog.name: proof-of-a-stark-heart
blog.title: Proof of a stark heart - as if it was truly necessary
blog.description:
Tony Stark Protection Squad
Team Iron Man to my last breath no matter what; I like most Steves (not the movie Steve, must be said). I shall choose to remain silent on my OTP - mostly because I can't choose just one,

title: #justironhusbandsthings
body:
• The first thing Rhodey does when coming home has always been turning the lights down low. It all started when they were rooming at MIT, and Tony would stay up “studying” (read, tinkering) while Rhodey had late aerodynamics courses. Tony would inevitably fall asleep on the couch, tucked under the patchwork quilt Mama Rhodes had made. Rhodey would shake his head, turn off the overhead lights, and carry Tony to bed.
    • nowadays, JARVIS can do it (and will, on days when Rhodey isn’t coming home) but he has learnt that this, this is something the dear Colonel wants to, needs to, do.
    • and so, when Rhodey comes home late and finds his husband sleeping on the couch, tucked under a threadbare patchwork quilt? Rhodey will shake his head fondly and turn the lights down low, before carrying his husband to bed.
  • when asked about it, later, when the dust has time to settle, Rhodey won’t say that it was desperation and a refusal to believe he’d been left behind that led to him continuing to look for Tony in that G-d forsaked desert; he’ll answer the heavy question flippantly, say I don’t think he’d die without us ever finding out which one is actually the best Go Fish player. 
    • There is actually some truth to that sentiment. They’re very competitive.
      • The real, actual truth about Go Fish? Rhodey’s better at that and at Bridge, any other card game Tony’ll handily smoke him at (board games, however, Rhodey’s the undisputed king)
        • Unless it’s Ludo. Tony loves Ludo. 
  • speaking of MIT, when Rhodey hears he’s got a new roommate? he curses quietly, once, before resignedly accepting his fate. when he meets the new roommate - big, soulful brown eyes, tousled black hair, looking like a kitten could bowl him over? Rhodey curses again and then decided there’s nothing for it - he’s gotta protect the kid.
    • it doesn’t actually happen that quick, it just sounds so romantic when he says it like that. what actually happens is that Tony, two years younger than the next youngest on campus, nervously keeps to himself, more or less pretending he doesn’t exist, until three months into their cohabitation when Rhodey gets the worst food poisoning of his life and spends three days puking.
      • during those three days he had two assignments to turn in, both worth a big percentage of his grade.
        • he got an a on both assignments, one of the professors going so far as to congratulate him in his nigh-on groundbreaking ideas.
          • Rhodey’s pretty sure he’s never had a groundbreaking idea about aerodynamics before, and when musing on this out loud he can’t help but notice his new roommate hunching even deeper over his textbook.
            • Rhodey decides he can probably like the kid, no big.
  • the thing is, Tony’s rich - like, ridiculously rich? While Rhodey didn’t grow up poor, they weren’t well off by any means. Christmas, their first year rooming together, that’s when Rhodey properly realizes there are different kinds of wealth.
    • Mama Rhodes had insisted on gifting Tony something for Christmas, despite Rhodey’s insistence to the contrary. Mama Rhodes, being a mother hen of rank, decided Tony needed a quilt.
      • Rhodey manfully pretended not to notice Tony’s tears when he opened the gift, but did take careful note of the way Tony swept the quilt around himself, more or less nesting in it.
        • the quilt didn’t cost much more than time to make, the fabrics coming from worn-out clothing and the like - monetarily, it had no value.
      • just the same, Rhodey did notice when Tony received a car from his father, and Tony did nothing but grimace in disgust.

blog.name: kitcat992
blog.title: Kitcat, Kitten around
blog.description: As fresh as a bag of wilting lettuce. Female, tired, East side represent. I'm here to scream about fandoms. Fair warning, I cry a lot about fictional characters.

summary: Amen to your last post! But woah, in what storyline does Tony Stark sic a bunch of super villains on our beleaguered hero? What...
question: Amen to your last post! But woah, in what storyline does Tony Stark sic a bunch of super villains on our beleaguered hero? What happened there?!
answer:
Canon 616 – Civil War. Peter initially joins Tony’s side of the war (which, btw was a full fledged war, not an argument as seen in the movies) only to later switch sides after registering under the superhero registration act, and thus having to reveal his identity to the world. It f@cks up his life and he realizes he made a mistake. Tony isn’t happy about him switching sides and they both battle it out. Tony later sends some bad guys out to hurt him. He’s nearly beaten to death and only saved by the Punisher, who takes him back to Captain America and his hiding place for treatment.

It’s worth noting Tony Stark is really the asshole in this storyline as opposed to the movies where Steve is made out to be the bad guy. Honestly? Just my opinion – Tony Stark is really an ass in all the comics. It’s cool if you like him and disagree, I just could never get into him with how they write his personality. RDJ really brought empathy to the character.

Feel free to ask any other Spidey questions, I’m a walking encyclopedia, lol.

title: You Belong Here, With Us

summary: You're Looking a Little Stark - Chapter 1 - Midnight_Clover - Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017) [Archive of Our Own]
body:
https://archiveofourown.org/works/17503247/chapters/41229119

You’re Looking a Little Stark - Chapter 1 - Midnight_Clover - Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017) [Archive of Our Own]

GUYYYYSSSS I just read what this fanfic has so far and I absolutely love it and reccomend it. It was so good!!! It’s set where Tony notices peter as an intern and is interested in him and brings him to his lab. tags: find someone who looks at you like steve looks at tony
title: 28 Days of Love masterlist
body:
“What are you doing,” Tony asked as walks into the bedroom. 

“Posting my last photo to Instagram for 28 days of love,” Steve replies.

Tony lays down next to him and looks at the photos on Steve’s phone. “So how did it go?” 

“It went pretty well. I still don’t understand why people need to know about our personal lives but I had a lot of fun,” Steve says. “Most of the comments I got were really nice. I think it may have helped with my art block. I also managed to do almost every day with us. Considering our schedules and lives I thought would be near impossible.” 

“That’s good. Will you keep posting photos?” Tony said. 

“I haven’t quite decided yet. But if I do, I am not so sure about it’ll be photos of us. But maybe my art work. We will see.”


February 1:  Holding hands
February 2:  Cuddling
February 3:  Gaming/watching a movie
February 4:  On a date
February 5:  Kissing
February 6:  Wearing the other’s clothes
February 7:  Shopping
February 8:   In formal wear
February 9:   Hanging out with friends
February 10:  Making out
February 11:  Eating ice cream
February 12:  During their morning ritual(s)
February 13:  Spooning
February 14:  Doing something fun/special together
February 15:  Spoiling one another
February 16:  Dancing
February 17:  Cooking/baking
February 18:  Going into battle, side-by-side
February 19:  Patching each other up
February 20:  Arguing
February 21:  Making up afterwards
February 22:  Sleeping In
February 23:  Having a lazy day
February 24:  Teaching each other how to do something
February 25:  Getting lost somewhere
February 26:  Teasing one another
February 27:  Trying to seduce one another
February 28:  Pillow talk

@averyrogers83 @auduna-druitt @captainsbabysitter-blog @pinkamour1588 @captain-rogers-beard @kjs-s @nasafic @s-horne @reioka @not-close-to-straight

blog.name: scottishaccentsareawesome
blog.title: *Cue "Boys of Summer" Intro...*
blog.description: She/Her! MCU-addict (specializes in loving Tony Stark and the Stark Family, including but not limited to IronDad & Spider-Son and Pepperony)! Loves Harringrove and Stranger Things but doesn't have Netflix (figure that one out)! Loves Dean WInchester, Brooke Davis, Tony Dinozzo, Jake Peralta, Tahani Al Jamil, The Doctor, Han Solo, Jim Kirk, Kara Danvers, Barry Allen, and MOST of the characters that come with all of them!

summary: (Peter and Ned have found Tony’s journal from when he was young) Tony: You guys have fun. Peter: Oh, we will. Tony: I used to...
body:
(Peter and Ned have found Tony’s journal from when he was young)

Tony: You guys have fun.

Peter: Oh, we will.

Tony: I used to have fun…

Ned: oh, we KNOW…!

*Peter quickly elbows Ned*

tags: love all the marvel ships challenge
summary: I managed to finish a challenge
title: I managed to finish a challenge
body: And I didnt miss any days. I also managed to make most of them about the ship I had chosen. So go me. Stay tuned for the 28 days of love masterlist. Thank you @captain-rogers-beard for hosting.
